model_answer: A: Because the materialâ€™s viscoelasticity makes it stiff and resilient under fast impacts but softer under slow pressure, so the slow stamp can deform it to hold the letters.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on materials science for help. Viscous elastic silicone rubber is a remarkable material whose stiffness depends on time; when things happen fast, it appears stiff and resilient but when life slows down, it has more time to return to its original shape.

Therefore, the answer is (D).
